tuv.seg: Auto-propagation of Translations
自动传播翻译
Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
请记住：更改语言可能会导致当前使用的翻译记忆库变得无用，因为其语言对可能与新语言不匹配。
Changing segmentation settings may cause some already translated segments to be split or merged.
改变分割规则设置可能导致一些已经译好的片段被分拆或者合并。
Changing this flag does not modify the segmentation of already existing translation memories.
更改此标志不会影响现有翻译记忆库中的片段。
Enable Sentence-level segmentation
启用语句级别分割
External Post-processing Command
外部后处理命令
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未勾选自动传播复选框，则含有替代译文的片段会保持未译状态直到用户决定使用哪种译文。

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by gluing together existing sentence translations.
如果您在翻译中途决定从语句翻译切换至段落翻译，项目的内部翻译记忆库不会更改（OmegaT 可能会升级不使用语句分割的旧翻译记忆库，但反之则不然），但 OmegaT 会尝试通过组合现有的句子翻译来创建段落模糊匹配。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
如果原文文档中包含非独特片段，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种自动翻译的可能性：如果勾选，则第一个被翻译的片段将假定为默认翻译，其译文文本在翻译过程中会自动用于后继命中。
In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
在一些少见情况下，替代方案，即按段落分割，可能会更好。
Languages
语言
Mistranslated segments can of course be corrected later manually using <g0>Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
当然，错译片段之后可以手动纠正。
Non-visible formatting (i.e., which doesn't appear as tags in the OmegaT editor) is retained in target documents.
不可见的格式信息（即不会在 OmegaT 编辑器中显示为标签的那些）在译文文档中会得已保留。
Options
选项
Project Properties
项目属性
Remove Tags
删除标签
See <l1>Segmentation Setup preferences</l1> for more information on segmentation rules.
见 <l1>分割设置首选项</l1>查询与细分规则相关的更多信息
Segmentation...
片段分割...
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
新的规则集将与项目一起存储，不会干扰到通用的分割规则集。
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
处理原文文件的方式。语句级分割是分割原文的主要方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
分割规则通常适用于所有项目。
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
但是，用户可能需要生成一组所讨论项目专用的规则。
This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used.
此区域允许输入一个在每次使用“创建译文文档”之后都会应用的外部后处理命令（例如，用于重命名文件的脚本）。
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties...</g2> </m0>
此对话框可通过选择
This external command cannot include "pipes", etc., which is why calling a script is recommended.
这个外部命令不能包含“管道”等，因此建议调用一个脚本。

This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.
这在处理内联格式并不真正有用的文本（如 OCRed PDF、转换不良的 .odt 或 .docx 等）时特别有用。正常情况下译文文档应当都能打开，因为只移除了内联标签。.
This will effectively return them to the "untranslated" status, as they will no longer match segments recorded in the project memory, even though their original translation is still there.
这实际上会让它们回到“未译”状态，因为它们和记录在翻译记忆库中的片段不再匹配，虽然它们的原始翻译依然存在。
To delete project specific segmentation rules, uncheck the check box.
要删除项目专用的分割规则，取消勾选此复选框。
Tokenizers corresponding to the selected languages are displayed.
会显示所选语言所对应的分词器。
Use this button to open a dialog, activate the check box <g0>Project specific segmentation rules</g0>, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired.
用此按钮打开对话框，激活复选框，然后根据需要继续调整分割规则。
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
启用后，将从原文片段中移除所有格式化标签。
You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
您可以手动输入或者通过下拉菜单选择原文与译文语言。.
